website_summaries.verdict: The SanDisk Extreme II is a speedy replacement for any hard drive, and it won't dig a big hole in your wallet.
pros: The SanDisk Extreme II offers faster performance, is now available in a 7mm design, and has a friendly price tag
cons: There's no desktop drive bay converter or other accessories included

customer_reviews.title: #AVOID# This PIECE OF CRAP & get ➜ Samsung Evo 850 PRO Drive Instead!
customer_reviews.text: Before installing this I never had a problem with my Mini--now every few days when I restart my computer it won't boot anymore--it gets to the grey Apple screen with the spinning gear thing and won't do anything else. "Solution" was to do a Command +R to reload the OSX! What a time consuming PITA (esp when you have to do this all the time). My Mini is no longer reliable... Its been over 30 days so I can't send this defective PIECE OF S*** SSD back to Amazon :( I guess I'll see what (if anything) SanDisk will do about this malfunctioning SSD.... Sorry I bought this.... Next time I'll get the Samsung Evo 850 PRO Drive....
customer_reviews.author: HKUSPc

customer_reviews.title: not too bad..
customer_reviews.text: I checked around for an ssd first and the reviews for this ssd were the best..one thing frustrates me about this though.. once installed and formatted there is 450 GB on this drive ..what gives ..its empty.. that's why its not a 5 star.. the drive is very fast though and I'm gunna keep it .. nothing else came with it.. no screws or mount..but they're cheap on amazon. Update 6/10/14 after receiving a comment about the space on it I decided to look it up and change to 5 stars.. It wasn't that big of a deal..this ssd is working great so far I've had no problems at all with it
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations, by a lot...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first SSD. I never really bought into what I thought was over-excited hype about instant (or near instant) booting or gigantic applications popping right up like nobody's business. I was wrong, it really is that fast. I have been putting it through its paces for a day or two now and I am nothing short of amazed at the increase in performance. I will never buy a mechanical hard drive again. I went with this particular brand and model after two days of reading user reviews, and reviews from hardware websites that included comparisons. This is the SSD to buy.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like these drives a lot. They are reasonably priced, perform well and have gotten great reviews. If you are looking for a way to boost performance on your laptop or desktop, an SSD drive is the way to go. The boot-up is much faster, and the performance increase substantial. I have two of these drives in my home-built desktop in a RAID 0 array, as the main drive for the OS, and two platter drives for backup and storage. They installed with no issues. I do a lot of video editing, and the performance is far better than it had been with standard platter drives.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in California

customer_reviews.title: This drive is FAST
customer_reviews.text: As a benchmark comparison, my Windows 7 experience index hard drive score went from a low 5.9 to an extremely high 7.8 (the maximum possible score is 7.9), taking my overall system score from 5.9 to 7.6 after installing and quickly configuring this solid state drive. I have an Alienware X51. The computer now boots extremely quickly and games run much faster and smoother. There is plenty of storage space for most people, besides I store my photos and movies to an external RAID storage device. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan'L

customer_reviews.title: Staw Away! Horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: This drive (SanDisk Extreme II 120GB) is now dead. It didn't even last a year. No longer detected by the BIOS. I've had 4 more that I bought for myself and my customers die recently. They don't last and will just drop dead with no warning!!! I truly hope this review saves someone the headache of losing their data!
customer_reviews.author: Better Computer Services

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop System Drive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for in Intel i7 build. As installed, it was for the system and software only (no data). When Win7 was first installed, it would boot in a few seconds. After installing a lot of drivers, utilities, etc, boot time is much slower, but still much better than using a spinning disk. With Win7, MS Office, and a few other programs, I've used up 100GB of its capacity. Am using a separate SSD for Photoshop CC for speed's sake. So far, no problems. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Dell and HP should wise up
customer_reviews.text: For some reason neither Dell or HP offer many reasonably priced alternatives for SSD desktops. I made the 1TB HDD that came with my sub $800 dell a data storage drive and added this as the boot drive. The PC now boots as fast or faster than an iPad and way faster than my phone. The hybrid HDDs that include a small flash drive are only a little faster than regular HDDs. Adding the drive can be awkward because some PC bays are not easy to reach but other than that the set up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Branca

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This SSD is fast. But more importantly for me and should be for everyone, is the SanDisk reliability record. SanDisk is use by OEMs and even a company like Apple is using SanDisk SSDs for their computers. Is a very reliable and fast SSD, very consistent. It doesnt matter if the drive is almost full, this SSD delivers in every scenario you throw at it. Is not the fastest ,but is there with the fastest and offers more security for your precious data. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Lora

customer_reviews.title: SanDisk Extreme II 240 GB SATA 6.0 Gbs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back in November, along with an HP ENVY , nice computer, watercooled, 24 GB of RAM added to it and a fast processor. It came with two gig hard drive, which was reasonably fast at start up. But I decided to add the SSD, and what a surprise. I had this drive for two months now and I'm still amazed how quick it is and how much work I can get done. In no time at all, if you're looking for a piece of hardware to pump up your computer, I advise you picked this up to Amazon at once. I rate this SanDisk Extreme II 240 GB SATA 6.0 Gbs no less than 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Newton

customer_reviews.title: Night and Day from a HDD
customer_reviews.text: You read about speed and "breathing new life into an old machine", but never really "get it" until you see it for yourself. Easy to install, Windows 7 does 90% of the tweaking for you and I've always had good product from Sandisk. Currently put this one into a Toshiba Portege R930 IvyBridge. With the savings in power and increase in speed, it's definitely a boost to ultrabook like pc. Would buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Bill R.

customer_reviews.title: Superb performance in a Mac Pro
customer_reviews.text: With 8 cores and tens of gigabytes of RAM, my Mac Pro workstation had only one performance drawback, the mechanical limits of spinning metal disks in conventional hard drives. By placing a clean installation of OS X 10.8 on a shiny new SanDisk SSD I blew this last bottleneck wide open and restored the balance of power in this fearsome machine. If you work in software, you can gain a major performance boost from storing source code on the SSD, because searches, IDE indexing and compilation demand very high file I/O and aren't generally optimized well by normal filesystems.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Play nice with Intel
customer_reviews.text: In amd laptops/computers this thing FLIES! But with Intel for some reason it BOTTLENECKS CONSTANTLY, it's STILL fast, but you notice games slowing down here and there. With AMD and the SAME GTX650 I can play Tomb Raider on ultra settings no hiccups... With an intel, I can only play on medium/High weith studders here and there. IT's not this drive!! And it's not the graphics card!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected, much faster than 5400RPM spinning drive, No duh I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Put this in an A Dell Inspiron 11 2 in 1 notebook. Made a big difference. Just regretting not paying a little more and getting 250GB one as the drive space runs out fast and notebooks don't usually have room for a second drive.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Homer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought one of these and an HDD. I figured I'd use the SSD for anything involving motion and the HDD for stuff where I was parked on a tripod. Well, the HDD failed me already. Buying another SanDisk Extreme II 240g and will be SDD for everything. Just wish the prices would come down as fast other types of memory devices.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Faster than you can say go
customer_reviews.text: One of the fastest drives out there but when you're comparing SSD's it's like splitting hairs. Boots the OS faster than my monitor turns on, gaming performance increased tenfold. The only complaint I have is that I didn't get the 480gig! 240gig is fine for most use, however since I've installed it my desire to expand my game collection has gone out the roof.
customer_reviews.author: adam denis lafreniere

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast SSD Drives
customer_reviews.text: Have these setup in RAID0. Tired of using the 128SSD as OS etc... Just bite the bullet and ordered 2 and setup with ease. I have near 1 TB of space with super fast speeds. Using Windows 8.1 as well. My 3 year old machine has new life! Now I have to just save up for new video cards =)
customer_reviews.author: John Covino

customer_reviews.title: ... was dropped and stopped working this worked as a perfect replacement. Solid state boots up very quickly
customer_reviews.text: 2011 macbook pro was dropped and stopped working this worked as a perfect replacement. Solid state boots up very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Historian_Clay

customer_reviews.title: I was cautious about SanDisk but I've been using this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was cautious about SanDisk but I've been using this for a while as my main drive. I upgraded from an older/smaller Crucial M4. Big enough to hold several games and Windows7. I'm sure prices have come down a lot since I bought it but I'll get another SanDisk when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Mickelle

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great disk. I bought this to replace an old Sandisk Ultra 120GB which worked flawlessly. Sandisk makes really good stuff and i really recommend this disk. Speed is awesome, if you come from a non ssd you will see a huge difference. even if you come from an older ssd you will notice a fine improvement. Really recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: five eggs-great speed for the price
customer_reviews.text: over all price was great it fast if you'r going from a mechanical hard drive. You'll be blown away with the load times and the speed 30 seconds to load windows and be in a game/movie/web browsing for the size i wouldn't recommend it for massive storage but its a great hard drive to run you'r OS and that's what its great at
customer_reviews.author: derek b

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a laptop
customer_reviews.text: Six months ago, I replaced the main disk of my Lenovo ThinkPad with this disk. It is silent, fast, anduses very little power. It has been completely reliable. I found it a great way to extend the life of my ageing laptop, and I would recommend it to anyone looking for an SSD in this size range.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in PDX

customer_reviews.title: A technological leap you want to make ...
customer_reviews.text: The improvement in speed, particularly at start-up, is incredible. You will never be able to go back to loud, spinning magnetic drives again. Computer runs cooler, faster and consumes less power.
customer_reviews.author: CatHunter

customer_reviews.title: I'm not past the 6month point and couldn't be happier. 480gb is a dream and I waited a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not past the 6month point and couldn't be happier. 480gb is a dream and I waited a long time for SSD's to hit the pricepoint where I could afford it and not feel like I was getting ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbakja

customer_reviews.title: bad experience for what should have been a solid SSD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my husband to help speed up his computer. The device did wonders for his computer at first. After just over 2.5 years, the SSD drive just died. There had been no warning, it just stopped working. Now we can only hope that SanDisk(now WesternDigital) lives up to their warranty. Still, bad experience for what should have been a solid SSD.
customer_reviews.author: samantha jo forrister

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast SSD!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fast SSD for the price, making it one of the best values going in SSD's right now. 450MB/s write speed and 515 read on a 2011 MacBook Pro with the drive 75% used space. Aperture 3 starts instantly now no more bouncing dock icon.
customer_reviews.author: R Russ

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: This drive has been in my MacBook Pro for about 6 months. No complaints. It's very fast and has been very reliable. There's not really much else to say. Installation was standard with no problems. I am running Chameleon SSD to enable TRIM.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Van Alstyne

customer_reviews.title: fast and very responsive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade my aging computer and it does makes it feel like new again, I would suggest to do a clean install as that's when you notice the speed improvement even more, I have installed it in my I-mac 2009 and it is just amazing how much it improved
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Strong performer, great warranty
customer_reviews.text: Most consumer SSDs are pretty close as far as performance, and this one is no exception. I bought this more for the 5 year warranty and excellent sale price of $169. I have no fears about it giving me many years of reliable performance.
customer_reviews.author: dparm

customer_reviews.title: Blistering fast
customer_reviews.text: I've not been able to saturate this drives bandwidth capability yet. Uncompressed hd-sdi, no problem. I'm building a storage server that will use 10 drives of these to support 6 x 8gbps fibre channel clients. I'll update later!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin N. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: ... on my XP Desktop and the system would run great, except once in a while it would lock ...
customer_reviews.text: I first used the drive on my XP Desktop and the system would run great, except once in a while it would lock up on boot-up. I moved it to a Windows 8.1 Desktop and it runs great with no problems. Boot-up in 20-25 seconds to log in prompt.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to be the boot drive on a new Video editing PC (Core i7, 32 GB RAM, 240GB SSD, 16GB RAID, nVidia 4000 graphics card. The drive installed easily and without any issues. The Win 7 boot time is only 23 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: HarryLJ

customer_reviews.title: Fast, but has issues
customer_reviews.text: Random reboots hurt. Every day or other day I experience a random reboot. This is the first SSD that this occurred with. The other boot drive in this system has never done this, so it has to be this SSD.
customer_reviews.author: robgrza

customer_reviews.title: Cream of the crop
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, top end, enthusiast drive with the best support and warranty in the business from the company that invented usb flash storage. I give it an unconditional recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: transcend

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD drive, no issues at all so far
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace a hard drive on a new laptop. I cloned the drive and installed it. The performance seems much, much better than the brand new hard drive that came with the computer. My Windows experience number on the SSD is 7.6
customer_reviews.author: JimMN

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good value for the price ($75 for a 120GB)
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these in Raid 0 and they will destroy a PCIE M.2 drive for a fraction of the cost. Extremely good value for the price ($75 for a 120GB), fantastic warranty, and they look great for those of us with red/black builds.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Works with BMPC4K
customer_reviews.text: When used in conjunction with the included plastic shim, this drive works perfectly with the BMPC4K camera body (after being pre-formatted, of course). I have two of these, and both have functioned exactly as advertised. The only caveat I can give is remembering to periodically reformat the drive between uses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buchbinder

customer_reviews.title: SanDisk Extreme II 480GB SSD
customer_reviews.text: Using this in a hybrid setup as my primary drive and can say that it makes my system (Intel i7 & ASUS Z87) VERY fast - everything just pops into play. Too bad these drives are still rather pricy - yet less than my 40MB drive in 1983 (which came with an error map).
customer_reviews.author: Jearro

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic. Everything installed is way faster than with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. Everything installed is way faster than with my previous 7200RPM, especially boot-ups. Great stuff. Plenty of space for OS and some programs/games.
customer_reviews.author: Fey

customer_reviews.title: Super fast -- High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Super fast SSD with the Sandisk reputation for quality. Excellent for video acquisition in un-compressed or RAW. I have these in my desktop too for super fast transfers. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Troy D. Turner

customer_reviews.title: handles 220Mbs write easily
customer_reviews.text: i use this with my Ninja Blade monitor recorder to record Prores 4:2:2, 1920*1080 video at 215 Mbs write speed. once i formated it with exFAT, took my PC couple of minuted to recognize it. overall, an excellent drive.
customer_reviews.author: M. khoee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I did have with this is the computer thinks its an external drive even when I'm connected internally through the motherboard.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Aurelius Maximus

customer_reviews.title: SanDisk Extreme II 480 GB SATA 6.0 Gbs 2.5-Inch Solid State Drive
customer_reviews.text: i am amazed by how fast my mac loads now. it used to take almost 4min from the time i pushed the on button till i could use it. now with the sandisk solid state drive, it loads in under 1min.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Tijerina

customer_reviews.title: Fast, but be sure to format
customer_reviews.text: Gotta format it, most techs would be shocked to know this has yet to be formatted but it isn't, so go ahead, save yourself the trouble, and format this thing before you use it. Oh, and its fast
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Hard Drive died after just 9 months of using. ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard Drive died after just 9 months of using. Very dissapointed. Never had to deal with hard drive which would last such a short time :( $130 dollars for something which doesnt last :(
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Enhances any computer
customer_reviews.text: Installation like most SSD can be a hassle, but once that's completed you will enjoy the speed boost of your computer. Specifically purchases and installed on my ASUS G73SW to shorten the load time of games and boot-up. Just wonder how reliable this beast is, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: RoyalGuard

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Drive!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace a SATA Hard Drive. Tremendous difference in performance. Boot up in seconds not minutes! Relatively easy to convert. Note that this drive does not come with a USB2/3 cable or cloning software; you must buy separately if you are migrating that way.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Councill

customer_reviews.title: Fast SSD
customer_reviews.text: Installed this SSD in my Vaio SVT. Made the not-too-bad puppy even better! This is my 2nd SanDisk SSD.... there's a good reason why!
customer_reviews.author: AOei

customer_reviews.title: Excellent upgrade for your windows install.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent upgrade for your windows install. It is a massive increase in performance against regular HDD and performs way better than most SSDs. Really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: nice price and performance
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fastest memory chip set and i found in this product the expectation for performance of my laptop. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Sandisk + Thunderbolt
customer_reviews.text: For all of you who wonder what happens when you install this drive into a Buffalo ministation Thunderbolt and connect it to your iMac here it goes. With some patience it's not too hard to open the ministation and swap the drives. The ministation will run warm to the touch with this SSD installed. The ministation COMES WITH a very short 17" long thunderbolt cable. After installation, I ran Black Magic disk benchmark. READ 384 MB/s WRITE 357 MB/s I'm happy with the write performance but not sure why the read performance isn't faster on my iMac i7 3.4Ghz.
customer_reviews.author: L. Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Lack of transfer software or hardware is disapointing, but I expected that reading other reviews. Makes the price look 20 bucks less than it really is, if you do it first time.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Super fast
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit expensive but it was well worth it. I put the SSD in my Gigabyte S1082 Tablet. Applications open faster than previously and the speed bump went from 5.9 to 8.2.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Solid State Drive
customer_reviews.text: One of the fastest SSDs out there and it has a 5-year warranty. I definitely recommend this drive and trust it with my application data.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Snow

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in my computer, formatted it, and it worked perfectly. I haven't had it long enough to comment on reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Young

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: The install was easy Solid State Drive, the operative system recognized immediately and I now have enough storage capacity and performance is great, now I save my files without problem.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: My Early 2011 13in Macbook Pro loves it and so do I
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to boost some load times for my laptop so I Installed this into my Early 2011 13in Macbook Pro and I love it! Boot up is less than 5 seconds. If you're looking to decrease weight and increase speed.. this is the upgrade for you!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My desktop is happy and is humming along. So far have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Freakin love it!
customer_reviews.text: Speed up my 2010 macbook to no end. Boots in under 20 seconds now. Was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great performance for the price. Boot time on windows 7 ultimate 64 bit is probably less than 15 seconds. Rates a 7.9(the max) on windows experience. Transfer rates are amazing and opening large software is no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with this SS drive
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze. This has made my PC lightening fast. I recommend this drive to those who are tired of a slow PC.
customer_reviews.author: Anon_man

customer_reviews.title: Solid SSD
customer_reviews.text: I am using the 480gb model with my Blackmagic Cinema Camera, the transfer times are very quick, it has a sturdy build quality, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M McFly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price, extremely fast, and I love the app that monitors the drive. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Freestone

customer_reviews.title: SSD with more memories
customer_reviews.text: I use to just buy the regular hard drives, but ever since I bought a SSD cache drive, i was hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: Fast and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these for a couple of Macbook Pros and so far they are flawless. I think you can purchase with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Scarab

customer_reviews.title: but it has not disappointed me yet
customer_reviews.text: When shopping for SSD cards, I read mixed reviews about this product, but it has not disappointed me yet, and I've used it over and over again for almost two years now. It's been very reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will not be dissappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I ended up having to buy locally because mine got lost in the crazy holiday shipping but amazon straightened it out! It is very fast, it sped up: Boot-Times, Download's, Internet Browsing. I have no idea how slow my PC was!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GrowShall

customer_reviews.title: Once you go SSD, you'll never go HDD again.
customer_reviews.text: Once you go SSD, you'll never go HDD again. Silent and really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn. Biker

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 480 GB version to replace a 320gb spinning drive. If you don't buy a drive with a transfer kit, Clonezilla is a free app to use to copy the drive over. I used Clonezilla, and it worked great. My boot times went to under a minute, from three and a half, and file access and transfers are noticably faster. If you are thinking of upgrading to an SSD drive in your laptop, this is the one. Low power consumption compared to other SSD drives.
customer_reviews.author: K. H,

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: highly recommended for anyone trying to boost their computers. Worked great with Mac
customer_reviews.author: JPG

customer_reviews.title: I love this, second best upgrade to my Macbook Pro ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fast and stable. I love this, second best upgrade to my Macbook Pro 13"
customer_reviews.author: Don't Jump More Than Four Chairs

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My son is using it for his computer, swift delivery, I will let you all know how long it lasts, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Lopresti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and the price was great. Fast Shipping. Secure product packing. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: TreverT

customer_reviews.title: Bring your old PC or Mac back to life!
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome. Have a Mac or a PC and that is a couple of years old? Bring it back to life! You will not believe the difference in speed of boot and application launch!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Great PC Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: My First attempt at a SSD. Purchased a Samsung 840 after this from Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O'Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great to install your OS on to speed up your system.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my dad's system to speed it up and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jlong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great ... i copied my dual-boot windows xp & windows 7 systems here.
customer_reviews.author: Sam-O

customer_reviews.title: good performance, but poor for the price...upgraded to Samsung EVO instead and haven't looked back since
customer_reviews.text: good performance, but poor for the price...upgraded to Samsung EVO instead and haven't looked back since

customer_reviews.title: They loved it. Thanks for the quick service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my client. They loved it. Thanks for the quick service.
customer_reviews.author: askpaul1

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my new C drive and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: First SSD. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: You have heard of the wonders of SSDs, Just do it, get one, trust me, you can thank me later. I purchased the Extreme II 480GB based on the recommendation of a coworker. I was not disappointed. I later purchased another Extreme II 120GB for my other laptop. I will update this review if I have any problems in the future. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Blackmagic Cinema Camera
customer_reviews.text: Fast but after formatting, there are about 20gb that are unaccounted for. Works really well for the Blackmagic Cinema Cameras. The included spacer is nice and makes for a snug fit inside the camera.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brewster

customer_reviews.title: works great. Fast and a great price (May 2014) at ...
customer_reviews.text: No problems, works great. Fast and a great price (May 2014) at $77.
customer_reviews.author: Player Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Affordable price for the relatively high IOPS ratings, good MTBF, and the best one is five year limited warranty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arijit

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Booting into Windows 7 took several minutes before I put in this drive. Now it boots in 20 - 25 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: MikeB

customer_reviews.title: First SSD
customer_reviews.text: Fast and works fine. Can give a more accurate review in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished restoring my Toshiba i7 laptop on this SSD. The Windows experience index on my original Toshiba HDD was 5.6 and now it's 8.5
customer_reviews.author: James K

customer_reviews.title: i didnt know how much i needed it
customer_reviews.text: got it fast, great price (got a good discount). didn't know how much i wanted it until i installed it. nice small thing, crazy fast, sandisk never disappointed me with USB drives, now I know they do good SSD drives also. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Woelz

customer_reviews.title: DIfference is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 7200 rpm 500 GB hard drive with the 240 GB SanDisk Extreme II. Larger programs load instantly and the computer is ready to use within 30 seconds instead of a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1800hr lifespan with intensive use.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered 6GB/s which you will notice coming from HDD. Failed after 20months of daily use. Generally 3hrs per day without swap disabled. Very Happy with performance/dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product, as described. FAST shipping, very satisfied. A +++
customer_reviews.author: Stivens

customer_reviews.title: This is a fast, reliable SSD that I use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast, reliable SSD that I use in my Black Magic Cinema Camera but would do just as well in a desktop PC.
customer_reviews.author: hoss

customer_reviews.title: this times 2 + RAID0
customer_reviews.text: [...] That speaks for itself. But I've had no issues with reliability they both had identical read and write speeds by themselves which to me screams amazing/consistent build quality. Which is quite the feat since i'm coming from OWC SSDs.
customer_reviews.author: Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great
customer_reviews.text: Just built a great new system and this is the main hard drive. No problems at this time to report. Shipped quickly, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tony J

customer_reviews.title: fast flash memory for people in a budget, enough ...
customer_reviews.text: fast flash memory for people in a budget, enough capacity for any OS an some other programs, makes boot up really fast, and starts everything on it equally fast, you cant go wrong whit this SSD! (until you forget your budget, that is)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Edgar Cepeda Torres

customer_reviews.title: Don't know whats wrong, after changed to this SSD ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know whats wrong, after changed to this SSD, my notebook (dell inspiron 1564 - window 7 64bit) freeze and need to force shut down the system. It happen when loading videos on WMP. or Other window system test.
customer_reviews.author: Aung Kyaw Kyaw Ko

customer_reviews.title: Quiet with less heat but more speed
customer_reviews.text: works like a charm. It is not as fast as I was hoping, but it is noticeably faster than a spinning disk. And it's quiet!
customer_reviews.author: mball

customer_reviews.title: super fast
customer_reviews.text: It is super fast and reliable. It could be (and probably is) a placebo effect (the need to justify the money I just spent), but I notice a nonnegligible difference between this SSD and the extreme I 128GB that this device replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Miranda

customer_reviews.title: May just be a Win7 thing.
customer_reviews.text: There is a small problem, it sometimes fails to load up programs. The problem is hardly ever a big deal, just slightly annoying. Still works better than my old HDD though!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: SanDisk
customer_reviews.text: It's working so good until now. I really like it. Waiting for price drop, will get some more . Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Van Nguyen

product_meta.title: SanDisk Extreme II 120GB SATA 6.0GB/s 2.5-Inch 7mm Height Solid State Drive (SSD) With Red Up To 550MB/s & Up To 91K IOPS- SDSSDXP-120G-G25
product_meta.description: Capacity:120 GBFeaturing SanDisk's cutting-edge solid-state architecture, the SanDisk Extreme II SSD can achieve sequential read speeds of up to 550MB/s. It can also provide quick file transfers during video editing and data backup, thanks to the exceptional 510MB/s sequential write speed; and it delivers random read/write speeds of up to 95K/78K input/output operations per second (IOPS), enabling quicker data access. Your computer will boot up in seconds, load programs quickly, and blow through the most demanding next-gen games.Smoother Gaming Experiences and Faster Multimedia PlayThe SanDisk Extreme II SSD provides hiccup-free, smooth gaming with faster loading and quicker multimedia playback. Videos, programs, and anything else stored on the SSD will load faster, saving time and increasing productivity.Reliable Design Extends Your Computer's LifecycleUnlike traditional hard disk drives (HDDs), the SanDisk Extreme II SSD has no moving parts, minimizing physical wear and tear. The drive is rated at 2.0M hours mean time before failure (MTBF).The SanDisk Extreme II SSD is designed to withstand shock and vibration giving it an additional layer of protection.Low Power Consumption for Quiet and Cool OperationThe SanDisk Extreme II SSD uses much less energy than a traditional HDD, placing less of a burden on your computer's power supply and cooling system. This SSD also runs more quietly than a hard drive, reducing your computer's total noise output.Generous Storage SpaceAvailable in capacities of up to 480GB, the SanDisk Extreme II SSD has enough room to store your entire collection of games and programs. It also provides plenty of space for backing up important personal data, such as photos, videos, and scanned documents.Compatibility and WarrantyThe SanDisk Extreme II Solid State Drive is compatible with SATA 6Gb/s motherboards and is backward compatible with SATA 3Gb/s and SATA 1.5Gb/s. It is backed by a five-year limited warranty.Western Digital Technologies, Inc. is the seller of
feature_bullets: Launch applications faster and enjoy quicker system boot ups/shut downs
Sequential Read/Write up to 550MB/340MB per sec.
Low power consumption for cooler operation and extended battery life; Power Consumption (active): 0.22w
Noise reduction for quiet drive operation; Vibration (Operating/Non-operating) : 5 gRMS, 10-2000 HZ / 4.9 gRMS, 7-800 HZ
Durable Stainless-steel casing in 7.0mm thickness; Shock Resistance up to 1500 G @ 0.5 m/sec
MTBF: 2.0M Hours, product backed with five year limited warranty
